# ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestContext

**Structure**

An object that contains details about the ISO 18013 mobile document request.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestContext
```

### Managing the context

- [doc://com.apple.identitydocumentservicesui/documentation/IdentityDocumentServicesUI/ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestContext/request]
- [doc://com.apple.identitydocumentservicesui/documentation/IdentityDocumentServicesUI/ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestContext/requestingWebsiteOrigin]
- [doc://com.apple.identitydocumentservicesui/documentation/IdentityDocumentServicesUI/ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestContext/sendResponse(_:)]
- [doc://com.apple.identitydocumentservicesui/documentation/IdentityDocumentServicesUI/ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestContext/cancel()]

## Instance Properties

- **request**: The incoming ISO 18013 mobile document request.
- **requestingWebsiteOrigin**: The origin of the requesting website, if present.

## Instance Methods

- **cancel()**: Cancels the current request from the relying party.
- **sendResponse(_:)**: Builds and sends an ISO 18013 mobile document response.

## Building identity document provider authorization UI

- **IdentityDocumentProvider**: An app extension that provides an identity document.
- **IdentityDocumentRequestScene**: A scene that indicates support for a specific document request type.
- **ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestScene**
- **IdentityDocumentRequestSceneBuilder**: A result builder that combines one or more `IdentityDocumentRequestScene`s into a single scene.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
